# myFindr

A frontend for [OpenHaystack](https://github.com/seemoo-lab/openhaystack) / [Macless-Haystack](https://github.com/dchristl/macless-haystack)

Features
- Date Filtering
- Export to KML
- Sharing

Demo:
[https://sonictruth.github.io/my-findr/](
https://sonictruth.github.io/my-findr/#)
